thread.section_title: FactoryPure Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FactoryPure | factorypure.com
thread.title: JasonH.

author: JasonH.
title: JasonH.
text: I bought a USED Champion 7000/9000W generator from FactoryPure. I was worried about it not arriving in time for my need, but when I talked to the their staff on chat, they told me it would be there Friday. It got there on the Friday I was hoping for and it was in pristine condition and started right up! I expect that I won't need another 7000W generator for a while, but if I do, or if I'm recommending one to someone, you can be sure, I will recommend the deal I got via FactoryPure!
